SEARCH
Package main.models

Class Block

java.lang.Object
main.models.Coin
main.models.Transaction
main.models.Block
public class Block extends Transaction
A Block class that represents a block in a blockchain system. This class extends the Transaction class and adds a timestamp and a list of transactions to the block.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Block(String add)
    Constructs a new Block object with the given address and sets the time to the current time.
    Block(List<Coin> inputs, String address, Long amount)
    Constructs a new Block object with the given inputs, address, and amount, and sets the time to the current time.

  • Constructor Details

    • Block

      public Block(String add)
      Constructs a new Block object with the given address and sets the time to the current time. Adds the transaction list of the parent Transaction object to this block's transaction list. Used to create a coinbase transaction
      Parameters:
      add - the address associated with this block

    • Block

      public Block(List<Coin> inputs, String address, Long amount)
      Constructs a new Block object with the given inputs, address, and amount, and sets the time to the current time. Adds the transaction list of the parent Transaction object to this block's transaction list. Denotes transactions of coins
      Parameters:
      inputs - the list of coins used as inputs for this transaction
      address - the address associated with this block
      amount - the amount of coins transferred in this transaction

  • Method Details

    • getTime

      public Instant getTime()
      Gets the time that this block was created.
      Returns:
      the time that this block was created as an Instant object

    • getTransactionList

      public List<Transaction> getTransactionList()
      Gets the list of transactions included in this block.
      Returns:
      the list of transactions included in this block
